Subject: EVERYTHING IS DOWN
Body: Total outage. 503 on all endpoints. Enterprise customer. 500 users affected.

Subject: How do I change my profile picture?
Body: Where's the setting to upload a new avatar?

Subject: Refund request
Body: Please refund my last payment of $49.99. I cancelled last week.
